name: MOONCHILD Demo
description:
When an alien crashes into your backyard, a grand adventure unfolds!
This is the demo for MOONCHILD, a turn-based RPG about four children saving the world from aliens!
This demo contains the first area and dungeon, and should take around one to one-and-a-half hours to complete, give or take.
Consider this a taste of things to come in the full version!

The game only runs on Windows. (Mac version will be added in a few days.)

And if you liked the soundtrack, you can get it here:
https://froginabox.bandcamp.com/album/moonchild-demo-ost-2
